content: I think I'll focus on one or two locations in each country. I want to make the most of my time and really experience the local culture and outdoor activities. In Costa Rica, I'll probably focus on the Arenal area and explore the national parks and beaches around there. In Thailand, I'll likely focus on Phuket and maybe take a few day trips to the surrounding islands. What are some must-know tips or precautions for traveling in these countries, especially when it comes to outdoor activities and interacting with locals?
